内达·阿内里奇 Neda Arneric

awards:
第29届威尼斯电影节(1968)
　　主竞赛单元 金狮奖(提名) 姆拉多米尔·普里萨·乔尔杰维奇

writer.name: 姆拉多米尔·普里萨·乔尔杰维奇 Mladomir 'Purisa' Djordjevic

director.name: 姆拉多米尔·普里萨·乔尔杰维奇 Mladomir 'Purisa' Djordjevic

introduction: 《正午》是战后前南新浪潮电影运动（又称“黑浪潮”“BLACK WAVE”）中的代表作之一，它的导演Djordjevic曾在1966年凭借《夜》获噶纳最佳影片提名，67年的《清晨》又在威尼斯获提名，并入选南斯拉夫影史10佳。68年这部《正午》是他的三部曲的完结篇，尽管故事讲述的是关于爱情，但摄影和表现手法都富有创意，甚至可以说前卫，片中有不少超现实的幻想场景，带有表现主义的造型和画面构图。The lives of many people in one Serbian town are changed after Tito's breakup with Stalin. This is a story about love between young Yugoslav girl and Russian guy who works in Soviet embassy in Belgrade. They get married but on their first wedding night a conflict between communist parties of their countries erupts. That means a young couple must depart with a very little hope that they will meet again.The story of love between a young Russian, employee of Soviet embassy, and a Yugoslav girl, which started in 1948. at a reception party in House of Soviet Culture in Belgrade. They get married, but during their wedding night, radio reports about the conflict between the Communist Parties of their two countries. This news meant parting, with small chance to meet again.
